ai-tika-abh08t18:1_0: any doubt about purification through overcoming doubt.
ai-tika-abh08t18:2_0: He who desires his words, practises opposites, and is the cause of the thirty-two parts of the body that were in the case of the one who performs them.
ai-tika-abh08t18:3_0: On the contrary, the seeds, the ground, and the adversities for the sake of wide seeds, and the earth because of a lake.
ai-tika-abh08t18:4_0: ignorance and the things that are the cause of craving, and the grasping aggregates of ignorance are a condition for grasping.
ai-tika-abh08t18:5_0: He is the master of his children, he is like the mother of a (giving) child.
ai-tika-abh08t18:7_0: She gets poisoned (from that), genuinely fields,
ai-tika-abh08t18:8_0: They’re not expelled about all things. They don’t exist after death, which they don’t wish.
ai-tika-abh08t18:9_0: What is good, wholesome, comprehensive, wholesome, Gaining, and what is good.
ai-tika-abh08t18:10_0: the result of that deed, the resultants has arisen in that place.
ai-tika-abh08t18:10_1: One who performs the opposite-mother and the result of deeds in this way,
ai-tika-abh08t18:11_0: In the same way, this is the cause of bonds: this is the reason why absence of the fruit of prescribing the fruition of non-process, this is how it should be rightly produced.
ai-tika-abh08t18:12_0: he doesn’t see anyone transmigrating, evening, he doesn’t know the morning,
ai-tika-abh08t18:13_0: for what is called rejected is the name of the donor, and what is put is given.
ai-tika-abh08t18:13_1: After having neither conceived in this way, nor do they perceive that she has, and knowing that she was the seventy-two years. She had been attached to each other, gave him regarded as holy by one who is two held together with the other (in return).
ai-tika-abh08t18:14_0: both are consecrated, and each other with four deeds:
ai-tika-abh08t18:14_1: The (thinking) deeds are neither dark nor bright.
ai-tika-abh08t18:15_0: gets hold of light and dogs,
ai-tika-abh08t18:16_0: for him are name and form, so beautiful and ugly.
ai-tika-abh08t18:17_0: Transmigration for the sake of (good) conditions, for the sake of the path, and for the sake of the paths -
ai-tika-abh08t18:18_0: Such is the defeat of this Dhamma.
ai-tika-abh08t18:19_0: The purification of doubt is finished.
ai-tika-abh08t18:20_0: The group of less than twenty is finished.
